N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7070.5 - Instructor orientation

State Regulations
(a) Before education personnel provide instruction to eligible youth pursuant to
the requirements of this Part, facility staff shall provide education personnel
with a brief orientation program on facility policies and procedures. (b) Such orientation program shall: (1)
provide education personnel with
information and instructions concerning security procedures to be followed
while they are in the facility; (2)
provide education and facility staff an opportunity to discuss and resolve
issues related to program implementation; and
(3)
be designed to facilitate delivery of the
education program within the correctional setting. Notes
